xml

Class Pathway

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml.Pathway

  • public class Pathway
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the information about a metabolic pathway belonging to an organism. The pathway is defined by its ID, name and organism. It possesses different entries and reactions. One pathway can belong to different orgnaisms.
    Author:
    Severine Liegeois
